channel.title: Comments on: If You Ever Need to Know
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: jenny
item.dc:creator: jenny
item.description: tubthumping? really? i'll make fun of that for a while, but kudos for including the Beatles.
item.content:encoded: tubthumping? really? i’ll make fun of that for a while, but kudos for including the Beatles.

item.title: By: Drey
item.dc:creator: Drey
item.description: According to iTunes, I have over 20,000 tracks. I didn't listen to all of them. I just sorted through the artists I knew I liked. I spread it over a couple of weeks.
item.content:encoded: According to iTunes, I have over 20,000 tracks. I didn’t listen to all of them. I just sorted through the artists I knew I liked. I spread it over a couple of weeks.

item.title: By: Ryan
item.dc:creator: Ryan
item.description: Just out of curiosity, how many total songs did you sift through? I shudder at trying this experiment on the 5000+ that are on my rockbox now....
item.content:encoded: Just out of curiosity, how many total songs did you sift through? I shudder at trying this experiment on the 5000+ that are on my rockbox now….

item.title: By: Drey
item.dc:creator: Drey
item.description: That must be on their last/second album. I think it was available on their site as recently as a year ago.
item.content:encoded: That must be on their last/second album. I think it was available on their site as recently as a year ago.

item.title: By: Mischa
item.dc:creator: Mischa
item.description:
i canhas torrentz plxkthxbai
If you can find it, check out "She" by 2NU.
item.content:encoded:

If you can find it, check out “She” by 2NU.
